    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeCrawler

        public NodeCrawler()
        This is the default NodeCrawler constructor

        The maximum number of attempts to find a path are set to 10

        The percent chance of trying a direct path is set to 50

      • NodeCrawler

        public NodeCrawler(Shipment shipment)
        This is the 1 argument NodeCrawler constructor
        Parameters:
        shipment - This is the Shipment that is being routed

        The maximum number of attempts to find a path are set to 10

        The percent chance of trying a direct path is set to 50

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<Segment> getPath()
        This is the getPath function, it will return a path from the start location to the end location or a null path if it fails.

        It will find a path based on the following steps :

        1) If the percent chance is greater than the chance of a direct path attempt a direct path

        2) If a direct path exists randomly choose one

        3) If we did not choose a direct path or one doesnt exist randomly pick a connecting Segment

        4) Repeat from 1

        Specified by:
        getPath in class RoutingAlgorithm

      • validPaths

        public java.util.ArrayList<Segment> validPaths(java.util.ArrayList<Segment> segmentsToCheck)
        This function will remove Segments that are not valid for this algorithm
        Specified by:
        validPaths in class RoutingAlgorithm
